alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 11:54PM CDT until July 16 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT/1115 PM MDT/ FOR NORTHWESTERN GOLDEN VALLEY AND SOUTHWESTERN MCKENZIE COUNTIES... At 1153 PM CDT/1053 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Trotters, or 23 miles southeast of Sidney, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trotters and Sather Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
